availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Elonzo L. Price (Union + Webster County, KY, farmer )

body.p: Union County and Webster County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Irvin Price and Nancy Price. Married to Mariah J. Rice Price in Webster County, Kentucky, on November 7, 1861. Resident in Union County in 1850. Household owned eleven enslaved persons in Union County in 1850. Farmer in Webster County in 1860. Household owned eight enslaved persons in Webster County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, District 2, p. 476B.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, District 2, p. 324-25.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Webster County, p. 555.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Webster County, p. 483A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Webster County Marriages, Film #000565876.
"Elonzo L. Price (1832-1908)," Find A Grave, Memorial #106116988, accessed July 22, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/106116988.
